about_the_game:
◆Story

Golden Axe Idol Kimmy is going to a tropical island with her "Business Couple" subunit partner, Sakura Maho, for the Hentailive Summer Festival! Unfortunately, Maho, being a bit of an airhead, got tricked by the organizers into signing them up with a bad contract. The two idols must now pay off their debt while maintaining their streaming schedule and participating in lewd challenges prepared by the organizers. Some of their idol friends have also arrived on the island. Will they find a way to turn the tables on the organizers together, or will they become their playthings? Gaining support from their fans through various means will be the key!

◆Gameplay

Similar to previous games in the Hentailive series, this game features resource and money management gameplay from "Golden Axe Idol," mixed with "Escape The Room" elements during story segments.

◆Game Features

◇ The story takes place after "Golden Axe Idol" and "Hypnosis Prison," centering around repaying a debt that suddenly falls upon the heroines.
◇ A massive script comprising over 100,000 words.
◇ Two protagonists with unique perspectives.
◇ Heart-warming "Business Couple" interactions.
◇ Several other idols will make appearances during the story.

◆Author’s Note

The "Business Couple" subunit is my favorite idol group, so I will do my best to make the game perfect.
I work long hours at my current day job to fund this game, so it might take some time for me to finish development.
Let's fight together!

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains consensual sex between idols and their fans.
There are no depictions of drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.

name: Hentailive - Business Couple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Golden Axe Idol Kimmy and her friend Sakura Maho are going to a tropical island for the Hentailive Summer Festival! But they end up racking a huge debt. On top of that, event organizers have prepared lewd challenges for them. Will they be able to manage?
